instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions; drain and rinse under cold water. Drain well. In small bowl, combine yogurt, mayonnaise, orange juice, and bouillon; mix well. In large bowl, combine pasta and remaining ingredients. Add dressing; toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper.
title: Waldorf Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1/4 cup frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
2 teaspoons HERB-OX® Chicken Flavored Bouillon Granules
